refnamediv.refpurpose: get BIO linked to an SSL object

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: SSL_get_rbio() and SSL_get_wbio() return pointers to the BIOs for the read or the write channel, which can be different. The reference count of the BIO is not incremented.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: The following return values can occur:

listitem.para: No BIO was connected to the SSL object
